title: A question about fill. Not autofill.
body: So I'm probably going to get a lot of backlash from this but has any Rioter or any Summoner asked or brought up the ability to disable a role for fill? Because I know the mindset is "i dont care what ill play, ill play anything" but what if the mindset is "ill play anything but this specific role (adc,supp,jungle,top,mid) for this one game" This is mainly to see what people might think of this.

replies.body:
They are working on that. 

Once they finish the new client and move everything from the old client to the new one (and thus close the old client) they are going to work on adding that and I believe the 10 ban system.

Actually they won't, they tried it on LAS and another region and concluded it it actually made queue times worse. The whole thing was scrapped. 

EDIT: I'm talking about the fill thing, not the 10 bans btw
Ah....Sad to hear but thanks for the update.
10-ban yes, the "all except x role" didn't make it through testing.
This would be helpful but wouldn't a majority of queuers just put support as the role they don't want to play?
I hate support but in all honesty I might, _MIGHT_ put adc. Hate ranged champs.
They also tried it in a couple small live regions, but it didn't fix the problem.
Yeah they actually had it on PBE, they removed it.
